name: Dehanın Yakarışı Kart Oyunu: Sistem Eğitimi

imgDesc.text: Find <color=#ffe14b>challengers in the open world</color> or enter the tavern after reaching Player Level 2 to play matches against <color=#ffe14b>weekly visiting</color> challengers and earn Player EXP, which will increase your Player Level. As your Player Level increases, you will unlock new functions and matches. Upon reaching a certain Player Level, you can also challenge Prince in Ascension Challenges to further elevate your maximum level capacity.

Genius Invokation is a popular card game with <color=#ffe14b>players coming from all corners of the world</color> . Face them in matches and overcome them to get <color=#ffe14b>P</color> <color=#ffe14b>layer EXP and Lucky Coins</color> . Should you be fortunate, some rivals might even gift you certain cards as a parting gift after the culmination of your duel. As your Player Level increases, the number of challengers you can face and the matches you can partake in will also increase…

You can use the <color=#ffe14b>invitation board</color> to send invitations to registered challengers and partake in matches. Should you prevail in these matches, you can also earn corresponding <color=#ffe14b>Character and Talent Cards</color> .
You can use the invitation board and connect with your friends via Co-Op to engage in matchmaking. As your Player Level grows, you can also challenge faraway strangers to duels of skill.

Spend the Lucky Coins you earn from Genius Invokation TCG matches at The Cat's Tail. You can use Lucky Coins to purchase <color=#ffe14b>cards, cards backs, and dynamic skins</color> , amongst other items.
